channel.title: Posts on FMC-IML-Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on FMC-IML-Lab

item.title: Weng Jian
item.description: One paper was accepted to CVPR2022: ******. Congratulations to Mr. Weng Jian!

item.title: Li Jinlong
item.description: One paper was accepted to TMM2022: Weakly Supervised Semantic Segmentation via Progressive Patch Learning. Congratulations to Mr. Li Jinlong!

item.title: Zhang Qiudan
item.description: One paper was accepted to TIP: Learning to Explore Saliency for Stereoscopic Videos via Component-Based Interaction. Congratulations to Mr. ZHANG Qiudan!

item.title: Wen Xuanzheng
item.description: One paper was accepted to ICME2020 (oral): Lossy Geometry Compression of 3D Point Cloud Data via an Adaptive Octree-guided Network. Congratulations to Mr. WEN Xuanzheng!

item.title: Sun Zhenhao
item.description: One paper was accepted to TCSVT: Multi-Exposure Decomposition-Fusion Model for High Dynamic Range Image Saliency Detection. Congratulations to Mr. SUN Zhenhao!

item.title: He Jingming
item.description: One paper was accepted to NeurIPS2019 (poster): Exploiting Local and Global Structure for Point Cloud Semantic Segmentation with Contextual Point Representation. Congratulations to Mr. HE Jingming!
